summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Life Saver QR emergency sticker generator application. Backend APIs are 90.9% functional with all core features working. Frontend is fully functional with proper navigation, form handling, preview, and public profile display. PDF generation and QR code functionality verified.

minor_bugs.issue: Invalid blood group validation returns 500 instead of 422
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling not following REST standards
minor_bugs.details: When posting invalid blood group, server returns 500 Internal Server Error instead of 422 Validation Error

working_endpoints.description: Generates PDF with QR codes successfully

working_features.description: Loads correctly with navigation and feature sections
Displays submitted details correctly with download button
Shows limited emergency info, phone links clickable
All navigation between pages working correctly
All pages responsive on mobile devices
Invalid profile pages show proper error messages

passed_tests: 404 error handling for invalid user IDs
Public profile page limited info display
Phone link clickability for emergency calls
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update validation error handling in /api/details endpoint to return 422 instead of 500 for invalid blood group validation. All other functionality is working correctly.
